gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 113, Spurs 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks defeat the Spurs, 113-107.  Kyrie Irving led the way with 28 points and seven rebounds for the Mavericks, while Luka Doncic added 18 points, 10 rebounds and 16 assists for his 18th triple-double of the season in the victory.  Devin Vassell tallied 19 points and six rebounds for the Spurs, while Victor Wembanyama tallied 12 points, 11 rebounds and six blocks in the losing effort.  The Mavericks win their sixth game of their last seven, improve to 40-29 on the season while the Spurs fall to 15-54.
